title: Portable Fishing Tackle Box with 4 Trays - Compact and Convenient
description: The Plano Portable Fishing Tackle Box with 4 Trays is the perfect solution for organizing your fishing gear. This durable tackle box features four adjustable trays with customizable dividers for a variety of lures, hooks, and baits. The transparent lid allows for easy visibility of your gear, while the secure latch system keeps everything in place. The tackle box comes with a padded shoulder strap for comfortable carrying and a large top-access compartment for additional storage. Ideal for both amateur and professional anglers, this tackle box is designed for convenience and functionality on your fishing trips.
key_features: Four Adjustable Trays with Customizable Dividers
Padded Shoulder Strap for Comfortable Carrying
Secure Latch System to Keep Gear in Place
